name: Codes & Ciphers
description:
Aimed at ages 8 - 12, Codes & Ciphers is here to teach you how to solve some of histories greatest ways of keeping secrets, shhh!

Play through three ciphers and nine puzzles to become the best code breaker you can.

Developed as a student project into game development and educational games.

Credits:

Mark Thompson - Programming & Puzzle Design

Matt Cato - Foley Artist

Kenney or www.kenney.nl - Aditional Assets
